EmailTemplate.name: CW16 bundle promo
EmailTemplate.subject: CW Conference and Subscription Bundle
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName}
I hope you saw the promotional email we sent out about a HUGE discount for a single user subscription AND a pass to the annual CW conference in May.
The total cost is $1,999 ($1194 savings!)
Compliance Week 2016 is May 23-25, in Washington, D.C. check out the agenda here.
An annual subscription to CW will keep you informed throughout the year. Attached is a quick reference guide to showcase what is included.
If you'd like to subscribe and attend the conference, just reply to this email and I can get you set up.
This offer does expire at the end of February.
Kind Regards,
